My family is small, but we are close.

participant_2.background:
I'm a teacher and I'm looking for a way to satisfy my hunger so that I can continue teaching my students.
I now enjoy gardening and cooking with my favorite ingredients.
i work as a personal trainer , 5 days a week.
I like to share my time and company with others.
I don't have any kids, but I'm close to my family.

content.text: Hello! How are you doing today?
I'm doing well! Just finished playing guitar and had a banana to replenish my energy.
Oh wow, I love playing the guitar too! I usually have a snack before I start playing, but I know bananas are a great source of energy.
Yeah, I have good health so I don't need to snack as much as I used to, but a banana is a great quick snack.
I try to eat healthy as much as possible. I'm a personal trainer, so I have to stay in shape.
Oh that's awesome! I used to be a personal trainer, but I had to give it up due to health reasons.
I'm sorry to hear that! I hope you're doing better now.
I am, thanks! I'm just trying to find a new way to stay active and healthy.
I'm sure you'll find something! What do you like to do for fun?
I love going to art museums and I'm a social media enthusiast.
Oh that's awesome! I love to garden and cook. I'm also close to my family. Do you have any siblings?
I have two sisters, but I'm not close to them.
Oh that's too bad. I'm close to my family, but I don't have any kids.
Oh, well that's good! I'm sure you'll have kids someday.
